game.title: The quest of the century
game.description: The treasure is hidden somewhere in the world. Find it!

task.objective: Find the treasure in the abandoned temple
task.description: Find the treasure hidden within the ancient walls of the abandoned temple. Be careful, it is guarded!

task.objective: Find the map to the treasure location
task.description: The map to the treasure's location is held by an old sage living in a secluded monastery. Be respectful and ask for his guidance.
task.location: In the heart of the Sacred Mountains
